properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 7:53AM CST until February 7 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Sucarnoochee River At Livingston Affecting Sumter County.

.Heavy rainfall of two to four inches has fallen over the
Sucarnoochee River basin...and a flood warning is now in effect for
the Sucarnoochee River at Livingston.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Sucarnoochee River At Livingston.
* until Friday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  7:30 AM Thursday The stage Was 17.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 18.4 feet after midnight tonight. The river
will fall below flood stage by tomorrow late morning .
* Impact...At 18 feet...Flooding of farm lands around Livinsgton
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
